content.title: You need to pay the fee
content.info: Your application has been submitted, but won’t be processed until you have paid the fee.
content.pay:
If you need to make any changes to your application you’ll need to contact the divorce centre on {{courtPhoneNumberEn}} (from {{courtOpeningHourEn}}
{{courtOpeningHourEn2}}).

content.title: Mae angen ichi dalu’r ffi
content.info: Mae eich cais wedi ei gyflwyno ond ni fydd yn cael ei brosesu nes ichi dalu’r ffi.
content.pay: Os ydych angen gwneud unrhyw newidiadau i’ch cais bydd gofyn ichi gysylltu â’r ganolfan ysgaru ar {{courtPhoneNumberCy}} (ar ôl {{courtOpeningHourCy}}).
